alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wadena and northeastern Otter Tail Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ottertail, or 28 miles east of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deer Creek around 730 PM CDT. New York Mills around 740 PM CDT. Bluffton and Wadena around 745 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
